    • Constructor Detail

      • AlgorithmLoader

        public AlgorithmLoader​(java.util.List<TokenValidationAlgorithm> supportedAlgorithmsForWebKeySets,
                       java.util.List<TokenValidationAlgorithm> supportedAlgorithmsForPublicKeysInConfig)
        Creates an instance of AlgorithmLoader with lists of TokenValidationAlgorithm provided.
        Parameters:
        supportedAlgorithmsForWebKeySets - default support. Algorithms to be supported for public keys shared from public key endpoints as JavaWebKeySet.
        supportedAlgorithmsForPublicKeysInConfig - deprecated support. Algorithms to be supported for public keys configured in config file.

      • AlgorithmLoader

        public AlgorithmLoader()
        Creates algorithm loader with default algorithms.

        Creates in JWTVerifier using Algorithms and audience.
